Now with Free Play Mode, Retina Display and Game Center Support!
If world domination is your thing, Virtual City is a great city simulator to get you started. Build your own city and manage it. Jobs are the lynch pin of the economy. As mayor, do everything you can to make sure industry is running. Fuel the city's economy by forming transport routes and developing a public transit system. Explore five states on the U.S. map and find perfect balance between key parameters of your success: Time, Income, Environment, Population, and Happiness. Make your dream city your peoples' paradise!
